title: sonnAl ozhiya
sahitya:
sonnAl ozhiya manam kELAdE sundarak-kaNNan sondamuDan seida antarangamellAm


anupallavi

  sonnAlum kuraiyAdu enrAlum idupOlum tandAlum haTam koNDa mannan tondaravellAm


caraNam 1    tA tai tA tai enru dharaNiyum onrADa shaTrE kETTOr mukham tAn ADumAm
kAdai iDum pATham kallena kallena kaNDOr kETTOr mukham tAn ADumAm
kOdai munnam ninru koNDADa koNDADa koLLai azhagiDa kuzhal UduvAn
rAdhai karattaNi ponnum kuzhalAlE nAnAvidha peNgaL alai mODumAm
    caraNam 2    pasi vanda vELaiyil pAl veNNai tAvenru paiya paiya ninra ninru vAdADuvAn
nishiyAn enru pAlum pazhamum tandAlO vEgamuDan ODi siruvarukku IndiDuvAn
nishiginra vELaiyil engE vandAi enil nimirndu iru tOLEri kUttADuvAn
nittA nimilA nIla muttA enil kannam neruDiviTTu engEyO pAindODuvAn
